datelife

Function to compute the SDM supertree Criscuolo et al. 2006

Function to compute the SDM supertree Criscuolo et al. 2006

RunSDM(filtered.results, weighting = "flat")

Arguments

filtered.results

List of patristic matrices
weighting

flat, taxa, inverse

Value

A list containing phy (a chronogram), and filtered.results that were actually used

Details

Weighting is how much weight to give each input tree. flat = all trees have equal weighting taxa = weight is proportional to number of taxa inverse = weight is proportional to 1 / number of taxa Criscuolo A, Berry V, Douzery EJ, Gascuel O. SDM: a fast distance-based approach for (super) tree building in phylogenomics. Syst Biol. 2006;55(5):740–55. doi: 10.1080/10635150600969872.
